  proposition: Corentin Royer, Bjoern Menze, and Anjany Sekuboyina published Multimedeval, a benchmark and toolkit for evaluating medical vision-language models in 2024.
    entity-attribute relationships:
    Multimedeval|PUBLISHED_IN|2024
    Multimedeval|TYPE|Benchmark
    Multimedeval|DOMAIN|Medical Vision-Language Models

    entity-entity relationships:
    Corentin Royer|AUTHOR_OF|Multimedeval
    Bjoern Menze|AUTHOR_OF|Multimedeval
    Anjany Sekuboyina|AUTHOR_OF|Multimedeval

  proposition: Xiang Li et al. published a paper on current progress and future trends of vision-language models in remote sensing in IEEE Geoscience and Remote Sensing Magazine in 2024.
    entity-attribute relationships:
    Xiang Li|PUBLISHED_IN|IEEE Geoscience and Remote Sensing Magazine
    Xiang Li|PUBLICATION_YEAR|2024

    entity-entity relationships:
    Xiang Li|RESEARCHES|Vision-Language Models
    Xiang Li|PUBLISHED_IN|IEEE Geoscience and Remote Sensing Magazine

  proposition: Callie Y Kim, Christine P Lee, and Bilge Mutlu studied human-robot interaction powered by large language models at the 2024 ACM/IEEE International Conference on Human-Robot Interaction.
    entity-attribute relationships:
    Callie Y Kim|CONFERENCE|ACM/IEEE International Conference on Human-Robot Interaction
    Callie Y Kim|CONFERENCE_YEAR|2024

    entity-entity relationships:
    Callie Y Kim|RESEARCHER_AT|Conference
    Christine P Lee|RESEARCHER_AT|Conference
    Bilge Mutlu|RESEARCHER_AT|Conference
    Callie Y Kim|STUDIES|Human-Robot Interaction

  proposition: Haoyu Lu et al. introduced DeepSeek-VL, a model aimed at real-world vision-language understanding, in an arXiv preprint.
    entity-attribute relationships:
    DeepSeek-VL|TYPE|Vision-Language Model
    DeepSeek-VL|PURPOSE|Real-world Vision-Language Understanding

    entity-entity relationships:
    Haoyu Lu|INTRODUCED|DeepSeek-VL

  proposition: Yuichi Inoue et al. created Heron-bench, a benchmark for evaluating vision-language models in Japanese, in an arXiv preprint.
    entity-attribute relationships:
    Heron-bench|TYPE|Benchmark
    Heron-bench|LANGUAGE|Japanese
    Heron-bench|DOMAIN|Vision-Language Models

    entity-entity relationships:
    Yuichi Inoue|CREATED|Heron-bench

  proposition: Yujin Baek et al. developed the K-Viscuit Benchmark for evaluating visual and cultural interpretation through human-VLM collaboration.
    entity-attribute relationships:
    K-Viscuit Benchmark|TYPE|Benchmark
    K-Viscuit Benchmark|PURPOSE|Visual and Cultural Interpretation

    entity-entity relationships:
    Yujin Baek|DEVELOPED|K-Viscuit Benchmark

  proposition: Lele Cao et al. introduced GenCeption for multimodal large language model benchmarking at the 4th Workshop on Trustworthy Natural Language Processing.
    entity-attribute relationships:
    GenCeption|TYPE|Benchmark
    GenCeption|DOMAIN|Multimodal Large Language Models

    entity-entity relationships:
    Lele Cao|INTRODUCED|GenCeption
    GenCeption|PRESENTED_AT|Trustworthy Natural Language Processing Workshop

  proposition: Xiao Liu et al. created AgentBench for evaluating large language models as agents.
    entity-attribute relationships:
    AgentBench|TYPE|Benchmark
    AgentBench|PURPOSE|Evaluating Large Language Models as Agents

    entity-entity relationships:
    Xiao Liu|CREATED|AgentBench

  proposition: Xiao Liu et al. developed VisualAgentBench to evaluate large multimodal models as visual foundation agents.
    entity-attribute relationships:
    VisualAgentBench|TYPE|Benchmark
    VisualAgentBench|PURPOSE|Evaluating Large Multimodal Models as Visual Foundation Agents

    entity-entity relationships:
    Xiao Liu|DEVELOPED|VisualAgentBench
